page.title: 01RURAL LIFESTYLES
page.content: In this block of 12 kilometers all of the land if farmland of one sort of another. Mostley it is intensive grassland with a little barley and wheat with a few turnips. There is also a few acres of mixed timber. All of the land in sections 5 to 12 is owned by the Marques of Cholmondeley which means the farms and cottages are rented. There is also a 500 acre park with Cholmodeley Castle standing in section 10. The castle grounds are open to the public every year and attract a lot of visitors. it may be of interest to you that since I have lived here some 35 years in Croxton Green. Some 5 dwellings have been knocked down or intergraded to one, this being soley due to the fact that farming has become mechanised and this need fr labour has dechived. This has resulted in the closure of the local
